title: A CLAMP
abstract: A clamp having two clamping portions, each arranged to hold an item in a fixed location relative to the item held by the other clamping portion. The clamping portions are joined by a connection means having a joint, the joint permitting the connection means to move between at least two configurations. In this way the clamping portions can be fixed in parallel, perpendicular or other desired angular orientation. It is envisaged the clamp will be used for locating two pipes in relative positions whilst being joined by means such as welding.

motivations: There is a need for a versatile clamp that can hold items in various angular orientations to facilitate tasks such as welding.
objectives: Design a clamp with adjustable clamping portions that can be fixed in different angular orientations.
methods: Develop a connection means with a joint that allows the clamp to move between at least two configurations.
results: Enable the precise positioning of items, such as pipes, for joining or other operations.
llama_json.research_subject: Development of an adjustable clamp for holding items in various orientations

motivations: There is a need for a versatile clamp that can hold items in various orientations relative to each other.
Current clamps may not provide the flexibility to hold items in parallel, perpendicular, or other desired angular orientations.
objectives: Design a clamp with two clamping portions that can hold items in a fixed location relative to each other.
Incorporate a joint in the connection means that allows the clamp to move between at least two configurations.
methods: Develop a clamp with two clamping portions joined by a connection means with a joint.
Design the joint to permit movement between at least two configurations, allowing for various angular orientations.
results: The clamp can hold items in parallel, perpendicular, or other desired angular orientations.
The clamp can be used to locate two pipes in relative positions while they are being joined by means such as welding.
openai_json.research_subject: Design and development of a versatile clamp

motivations: There is a need for a versatile clamping device that can hold two items in various angular orientations relative to each other during joining operations.
objectives: Develop a clamp with adjustable clamping portions that can be fixed in parallel, perpendicular, or other desired angular orientations to facilitate joining operations such as welding.
methods: Design a clamp with two clamping portions connected by a joint mechanism that allows movement between multiple configurations.
results: Enable precise positioning and holding of two pipes or similar items in various relative orientations during welding or other joining processes.
anthropic_json.research_subject: Adjustable multi-configuration clamp for pipe joining operations
